desc: We deliver pre-portioned delicious meal kits come with fresh ingredients and easy-to-follow recipes to make home cooking simple, delicious and healthy. SquarePlate meal kits perfectly portioned ingredients from sustainable and organic sources. Cooking a complete meal in less than 30 minutes is now a reality.

layout.text: Home cooking made simple, delicious & healthy!
We deliver delicious meal kits right to your doorstep. Our pre-portioned meal kits come with fresh ingredients and easy-to-follow recipes to make home cooking simple, delicious and healthy.
